00058 SO_NODE_SOURCE(TDefaultSunShape);
00059 
00060 void TDefaultSunShape::initClass()
00061 {
00062         SO_NODE_INIT_CLASS(TDefaultSunShape, TSunShape, "TSunShape");
00063 }
00064 
00065 TDefaultSunShape::TDefaultSunShape( )
00066 {
00067         SO_NODE_CONSTRUCTOR(TDefaultSunShape);
00068         SO_NODE_ADD_FIELD(m_irradiance, (10.0));
00069         SO_NODE_ADD_FIELD(m_thetaMax, (-5.0));
00070 
00071 }
00072 
00073 TDefaultSunShape::~TDefaultSunShape()
00074 {
00075 }
00076 
00077 //Light Interface
00078 void TDefaultSunShape::generateRayDirection( Vector3D& direction, RandomDeviate& rand ) const
00079 {
00080     static double TwoPi = 2.0 * tgc::Pi;
00081 
00082     double phi = TwoPi * rand.RandomDouble();
00083     double sinTheta = sin( m_thetaMax.getValue() )*sqrt( rand.RandomDouble());
00084     double cosTheta = sqrt( 1.0 - sinTheta*sinTheta );
00085     double cosPhi = cos( phi );
00086     double sinPhi = sin( phi );
00087 
00088     direction.x = sinTheta*cosPhi;
00089     direction.y = cosTheta;
00090     direction.z = sinTheta*sinPhi;
00091 }
00092 
00093 SoNode* TDefaultSunShape::copy( SbBool copyConnections ) const
00094 {
00095         // Use the standard version of the copy method to create
00096         // a copy of this instance, including its field data
00097         TDefaultSunShape* newSunShape = dynamic_cast< TDefaultSunShape* >( SoNode::copy( copyConnections ) );
00098         
00099         // Copy the m_thetaMin, m_thetaMax private members explicitly
00100         newSunShape->m_irradiance = m_irradiance;
00101         newSunShape->m_thetaMax = m_thetaMax;
00102         
00103         return newSunShape;
00104 }
